item.title: 软件工程复习笔记
item.description: Software Process Software process models: The waterfall model, Incremental development, Reuse-oriented software engineering. Waterfall model phases: Requirements analysis and definition, System and software design, Implementation and unit testing, Integration and system testing, Operation and maintenance. The main drawback of the waterfall model: the difficulty of accommodating change after the process is underway. (In principle, a phase has to be complete before moving onto the next phase.) The waterfall model is
